state - of - the - art results.from sentence: We present results on the CoNLL - 2005 shared task and the CoNLL - 2012 English subset of OntoNotes 5.0 , achieving state - of - the - art results for a single model with predicted predicates on both corpora .

injecting.has: state - of - the - art predicted parses

demonstrate that.from sentence: We demonstrate that our models benefit from injecting state - of - the - art predicted parses at test time ( + D&M ) by fixing the attention to parses predicted by Dozat and Manning ( 2017 ) , the winner of the 2017 CoNLL shared task which we re-train using ELMo embeddings .

our syntax - free SA model.from sentence: For models using GloVe embeddings , our syntax - free SA model already achieves a new state - of - the - art by jointly predicting predicates , POS and SRL .

LISA.from sentence: LISA with it s own parses performs comparably to SA , but when supplied with D&M parses LISA out - performs the previous state - of - the - art by 2.5 F1 points .

On the out - ofdomain Brown test set , LISA also performs comparably to its syntax - free counterpart with its own parses , but with D&M parses LISA performs exceptionally well , more than 3.5 F1 points higher than He et al ..

Incorporating.from sentence: Incorporating ELMo em-beddings improves all scores .
